original_title: Exote: La filmación de La telenovela errante
overview: A documentary recorded during the filming of "The Wandering Soap Opera" by Raúl Ruiz. Made in 1990 and completed 27 years later, in 2017. The film brings closer the approach in Ruiz's directing style and his personal vision of Cinema.
title: Exote: Filming Of The Wandering Soap Opera
